attributes.action: Review SSP to those deemed "extremely vulnerable" during coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: I personally have a family of 5 and would normally be at work if it was not for the letter telling me to stay at home for at least 12 weeks. There are reportedly 1.2 million people who received this letter and I feel that these people need answers as to how we are supposed to live on SSP.
attributes.background: Review payments for those who have been deemed high risk and have received a letter telling them to stay at home for at least 12 weeks. SSP simply is not enough as most people who received this letter would be at work if it wasn't for the government telling them not to be.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
